channel.title: microsoft legal on Neil Grogan
channel.description: Recent content in microsoft legal on Neil Grogan

item.title: Get the facts, about "Get the Facts"
item.description: Just a quick blurb about some things Microsoft like to say: Don’t believe it, well at least not it all anyway. On the Irish “Get the Facts” page (on Windows Server vs. Linux), they make critical errors of judgement a person reasonably well versed in computing could deconstruct. First of all, Linux isn’t a server, its a kernel, like the Windows kernel. So comparing “Windows Server 2003” to “Linux” is misleading to say the least, and stupid to say the most.
